title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: More Vehicles Eligible for Drift Tuning
content:
Unleash the daredevil within and remove friction from your life by adding Drift Tuning to newly eligible vehicles: the Vulcar Nebula Turbo (Sports Classic), Übermacht Cypher (Sports), and Übermacht Sentinel Classic Widebody (Sports).

You’ll need an LS Car Meet membership and one of the new suitable vehicles before you can decorate the asphalt with your donuts. Visit the LS Car Meet in an eligible vehicle to install the Drift Tuning upgrade.
